GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.15 to before v4.19.238
GSD.description:
jffs2: fix memory leak in jffs2_scan_medium

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit e711913463af916d777a4873068f415f1fe2ad33, it was introduced in version v2.6.15 by commit e631ddba588783edd521c5a89f7b2902772fb691. For more details please see the references link.
